post.description:
Handles incoming POST requests to the main A2A endpoint.

Parses the request body as JSON, validates it against A2A request types,
dispatches it to the appropriate handler method, and returns the response.
Handles JSON parsing errors, validation errors, and other exceptions,
returning appropriate JSON-RPC error responses.

Args:
    request: The incoming Starlette Request object.

Returns:
    A Starlette Response object (JSONResponse or EventSourceResponse).

Raises:
    (Implicitly handled): Various exceptions are caught and converted
    into JSON-RPC error responses by this method.

get.description:
Handles GET requests for the agent card endpoint.

Args:
    request: The incoming Starlette Request object.

Returns:
    A JSONResponse containing the agent card data.

Handles GET requests for the agent card endpoint.

Args:
    request: The incoming Starlette Request object.

Returns:
    A JSONResponse containing the agent card data.

CancelTaskRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `tasks/cancel` method.
CancelTaskRequest.title: CancelTaskRequest

DataPart.description: Represents a structured data segment (e.g., JSON) within a message or artifact.
DataPart.title: DataPart

DeleteTaskPushNotificationConfigParams.description: Defines parameters for deleting a specific push notification configuration for a task.
DeleteTaskPushNotificationConfigParams.title: DeleteTaskPushNotificationConfigParams

DeleteTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `tasks/pushNotificationConfig/delete` method.
DeleteTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest.title: DeleteTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest

FilePart.description:
Represents a file segment within a message or artifact. The file content can be
provided either directly as bytes or as a URI.
FilePart.title: FilePart

FileWithBytes.description: Represents a file with its content provided directly as a base64-encoded string.
FileWithBytes.title: FileWithBytes

FileWithUri.description: Represents a file with its content located at a specific URI.
FileWithUri.title: FileWithUri

GetAuthenticatedExtendedCardRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `agent/getAuthenticatedExtendedCard` method.
GetAuthenticatedExtendedCardRequest.title: GetAuthenticatedExtendedCardRequest

GetTaskPushNotificationConfigParams.description: Defines parameters for fetching a specific push notification configuration for a task.
GetTaskPushNotificationConfigParams.title: GetTaskPushNotificationConfigParams

GetTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `tasks/pushNotificationConfig/get` method.
GetTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest.title: GetTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest

GetTaskRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `tasks/get` method.
GetTaskRequest.title: GetTaskRequest

ListTaskPushNotificationConfigParams.description: Defines parameters for listing all push notification configurations associated with a task.
ListTaskPushNotificationConfigParams.title: ListTaskPushNotificationConfigParams

ListTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `tasks/pushNotificationConfig/list` method.
ListTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest.title: ListTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest

Message.description: Represents a single message in the conversation between a user and an agent.
Message.title: Message

MessageSendConfiguration.description: Defines configuration options for a `message/send` or `message/stream` request.
MessageSendConfiguration.title: MessageSendConfiguration

MessageSendParams.description:
Defines the parameters for a request to send a message to an agent. This can be used
to create a new task, continue an existing one, or restart a task.
MessageSendParams.title: MessageSendParams

PushNotificationAuthenticationInfo.description: Defines authentication details for a push notification endpoint.
PushNotificationAuthenticationInfo.title: PushNotificationAuthenticationInfo

PushNotificationConfig.description: Defines the configuration for setting up push notifications for task updates.
PushNotificationConfig.title: PushNotificationConfig

Role.description: Identifies the sender of the message. `user` for the client, `agent` for the service.
Role.title: Role

SendMessageRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `message/send` method.
SendMessageRequest.title: SendMessageRequest

SendStreamingMessageRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `message/stream` method.
SendStreamingMessageRequest.title: SendStreamingMessageRequest

SetTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `tasks/pushNotificationConfig/set` method.
SetTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest.title: SetTaskPushNotificationConfigRequest

TaskIdParams.description: Defines parameters containing a task ID, used for simple task operations.
TaskIdParams.title: TaskIdParams

TaskPushNotificationConfig.description: A container associating a push notification configuration with a specific task.
TaskPushNotificationConfig.title: TaskPushNotificationConfig

TaskQueryParams.description: Defines parameters for querying a task, with an option to limit history length.
TaskQueryParams.title: TaskQueryParams

TaskResubscriptionRequest.description: Represents a JSON-RPC request for the `tasks/resubscribe` method, used to resume a streaming connection.
TaskResubscriptionRequest.title: TaskResubscriptionRequest

TextPart.description: Represents a text segment within a message or artifact.
TextPart.title: TextPart
